bibl.title: with contributions by T.V. Buttrey, R.M. Harrison, J. Reynolds, J.B. Ward-Perkins and G.R.H. Wright, Apollonia, the Port of Cyrene. Excavations by the University of Michigan 1965-1967
bibl.note: Voir pp. 305-306, No. 24, à propos d'une inscription en l'honneur de Ptolémée VIII Sôtèr II. - Non vidimus.
Reynolds J., The Inscriptions of Apollonia.

R.G. Goodchild, J.G. Pedley and D. White (Edd.), with contributions by T.V. Buttrey, R.M. Harrison, J. Reynolds, J.B. Ward-Perkins and G.R.H. Wright, Apollonia, the Port of Cyrene.
